Sentencas: In this study, the application of a rolling horizon optimization strategy to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell/compressed air energy storage plant for load-following is investigated.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty

Sentencas: A reduced-order model of the integrated plant is used to simulate and optimize each optimization interval as a mixed integer nonlinear program.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty

Sentencas: Forecasting uncertainties are considered through the addition of measurement noise and use of stochastic Monte Carlo simulations.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty

Sentencas: The addition of rolling horizon optimization gives significant reductions to the sum-of-squared-errors between the demand and supply profiles.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty

Sentencas: A sensitivity analysis is used to show that increasing the forecasting and optimization horizon improves load tracking with diminishing returns.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty

Sentencas: Incorporating white Gaussian noise to demand forecasts has a marginal impact on error, even when a relatively high noise power of is used.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty

Sentencas: Consistently over- or under-predicting demand has a greater impact on the plant's load-tracking error.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty

Sentencas: However, even under worst-case forecasting scenarios, using a rolling horizon optimization scheme provides a more than 50% reduction in error when compared to the original system.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty

Sentencas: An economic objective function is formulated to improve gross revenue using electricity spot-prices, but results in a trade-off with load-following performance.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty

Sentencas: The results indicate that the rolling horizon optimization approach could potentially be applied to future municipal-scale fuel cell/compressed air storage systems to achieve power levels which closely follow real grid power cycles using existing prediction models.
Titulo: Application of rolling horizon optimization to an integrated solid-oxide fuel cell and compressed air energy storage plant for zero-emissions peaking power under uncertainty
